info.description: This page lists all the rest apis for Voucher Management ervice.
info.title: LMS Voucher Management Rest APIs

parameters.name: id_event
parameters.description: Event id

parameters.name: reset_error
parameters.description: Error reset message

parameters.name: idVoucher
parameters.description: idVoucher

parameters.name: voucherNumber
parameters.description: voucherNumber

get.summary: Resend email for the specified voucher_id

parameters.name: idVoucher
parameters.description: Id of the voucher

parameters.name: voucherNumber
parameters.description: voucherNumber

post.summary: Request to add a new prepaid/free voucher in MyLearn

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: request

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of the voucher. Mandatory. Can be either PREPAID or ON_DEMAND

get.summary: Load voucher page category drop down form values for add new voucher page in MyLearn

parameters.name: collegeId
parameters.description: College Id. Defaults to 33 if not specified

200.description: Form values for add new voucher page loaded

put.summary: Request to add classes to free voucher in MyLearn

parameters.name: class_ids
parameters.description: Class Id comma separated values as one single string to be passed, mandatory

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Mandatory, user who added the class to voucher

parameters.name: voucher_id
parameters.description: Id of the voucher. Mandatory.

delete.summary: Request to remove classes to free voucher in MyLearn

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Mandatory, user who removed the class from voucher

parameters.name: voucher_class_id
parameters.description: Class Id comma separated values as one single string to be passed, mandatory

parameters.name: voucher_id
parameters.description: Id of the voucher. Mandatory.

get.summary: Load free voucher page college dropdown form values for add new free voucher page in MyLearn

200.description: Form values for add new voucher page loaded

get.summary: Load voucher details for prepaid/on demand voucher properties page in MyLearn

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of the voucher. Can be either PREPAID or ON_DEMAND

parameters.name: voucher_id
parameters.description: Id of the voucher. Mandatory.

200.description: Details for prepaid or on demand vouchers retrieved

put.summary: Request to update properties of prepaid voucher in MyLearn

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: request

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of the voucher. Defaults to PREPAID. Can be either PREPAID or ON_DEMAND (free)

put.summary: Request to update owners of on demand voucher in MyLearn

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Email of the new owner

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Mandatory, User who update owner

parameters.name: voucherId
parameters.description: Id of the voucher

200.description: Owner for on demand vouchers updated

get.summary: Fetch list of voucher items (paginated) for a prepaid voucher in MyLearn

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: Current Page of the voucher items table. NOT Mandatory. Starts with 1 and defaults to 1 if not provided

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Number of voucher items to be displayed per page. NOT Mandatory. defaults to 50

parameters.name: searchField
parameters.description: Column name for which the voucher items need to be searched by. NOT Mandatory. Can have values in this list:{voucher_number, purchaser, redeemer_name, redeemer_email, accountID and ('assigned_to' *only for free vouchers )}

parameters.name: searchKey
parameters.description: Value with which the voucher items need to be searched for. NOT Mandatory.

parameters.name: sortField
parameters.description: Column name by which the voucher items need to be sorted. NOT Mandatory. Can have values in this list:{voucher_number, date_expire, purchaser, redeemer_name,accountID, paymentID, RegistrantID, OracleOrderID and (‘assigned_to’ *only for free vouchers )}

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: Sort order for the sort field. Can have values -1 for descending OR 1 for ascending. NOT Mandatory, default value is 1

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Status of the voucher. NOT Mandatory. Can be UNASSIGNED, DELETED or ALL. Default is ALL

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of the voucher. Defaults to prepaid. Can be either PREPAID or ON_DEMAND (free)

parameters.name: voucher_id
parameters.description: voucher_id

200.description: List of items prepaid/free vouchers retrieved

post.summary: Import voucher items from text file for prepaid voucher in MyLearn

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: File containing list of voucher items

parameters.name: fileName
parameters.description: File Name which user imports to laod list of voucher items

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: User who imports the voucher items

parameters.name: voucher_id
parameters.description: Id of the voucher

200.description: Voucher items from txt file imported

put.summary: Update expiry date for voucher items based on voucher number and voucher id for prepaid voucher in MyLearn

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: User who update the voucher item

parameters.name: voucherItemList
parameters.description: voucherItemList

parameters.name: voucher_id
parameters.description: voucher_id

get.summary: Export to excel all voucher items for prepaid voucher in MyLearn

parameters.name: searchField
parameters.description: Column name for which the voucher items need to be searched by. NOT Mandatory. Can have values in this list:{voucher_number, purchaser, redeemer_name, redeemer_email, accountID}

parameters.name: searchKey
parameters.description: Value with which the voucher items need to be searched for. NOT Mandatory.

parameters.name: sortField
parameters.description: Column name by which the voucher items need to be sorted. NOT Mandatory. Can have values in this list:{voucher_number, date_expire, purchaser, redeemer_name,accountID, paymentID, RegistrantID, OracleOrderID}

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: Sort order for the sort field. Can have values -1 for descending OR 1 for ascending. NOT Mandatory, default value is 1

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Status of the voucher. NOT Mandatory. Can be UNASSIGNED, DELETED or ALL. Default is ALL

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of the voucher. Defaults to prepaid. Can be either PREPAID or ON_DEMAND (free)

parameters.name: voucher_id
parameters.description: voucher_id

200.description: All items for prepaid voucher exported to excel

put.summary: Delete/Inactivate or Restore/Activate voucher items based on voucher item number for prepaid voucher in MyLearn

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: Status to be updated for voucher items, 1 stands for active and 0 stands for inactive

parameters.name: item_list
parameters.description: Selected voucher items for status update

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: User who update the status of the voucher

parameters.name: voucher_id
parameters.description: voucher_id

get.summary: Get vouchers list on page load for Prepaid or On Demand vouchers page in MyLearn

parameters.name: groupIds
parameters.description: Only applicable to free vouchers, group access for specific free vouchers management. Comma separated group Ids, pass both SESSION.qMyGroups.grp_id, SESSION.qGroups.grp_id from cfusion here joined with commas.

parameters.name: restrictVouchers
parameters.description: Only applicable to free vouchers, Parameter stating if access to vouchers is restricted for the current user

parameters.name: showInactive
parameters.description: Flag which dicates whether active or inactive vouchers are retreived. Not mandatory. Active vouchers fetched if not provided

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of the voucher. Mandatory. Can be either PREPAID or ON_DEMAND (free)

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Applicable only for restricted free vouchers

get.summary: Check for low watermark for all vouchers, send mails if insufficient quantity of valid vouchers present
Generate voucher Distribution(prepaid)/Redemption(free) report for a prepaid voucher in MyLearn

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: End Date. Mandatory, format accepted is MM-DD-YYYY. Mandatory

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Start Date. Is mandatory, format accepted is MM-DD-YYYY. Mandatory

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of the voucher. Defaults to prepaid. Can be either PREPAID or ON_DEMAND (free)

parameters.name: voucher_id
parameters.description: Voucher Id

get.summary: Load voucher page sku dropdown form values for add new voucher page in MyLearn

parameters.name: collegeId
parameters.description: College Id. Defaults to 33 if not specified

200.description: Perpaid vouchers only. Form values for add new voucher page loaded
